Looking at the years, 2013 is the latest year listed. Let me check the two most recent competitions before that. The last row is 2013 with a distance of 79.36 m. Before that, the 2012 Olympics in London show he threw 77.17 m.

The claim says the average is 78.27 m, which matches my calculation (78.265 rounds up to 78.27). Therefore, the claim seems to be true.

The claim is TRUE based on the distances from the last two competitions in 2012 and 2013.
